item.description:
Our Information Security team has observed a recurring trend during the holiday season: cybercriminals often target organizations and college campuses with phishing attacks. These emails may contain suspicious links, malicious attachments, or fraudulent websites designed to steal login credentials. Falling victim to such attacks can compromise your device or RCS account, potentially leading to data loss, system instability, and serious security vulnerabilities.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
